rule: When connectivity to Heimdal is unstable or keys are misconfigured, run fix_heimdal.sh to regenerate an ed25519 keypair, push the public key to the active Heimdal IP, rewrite the SSH config alias 'heimdal', refresh known_hosts, and verify the connection with a small rsync roundtrip to /tmp.
anti_rule: Do NOT run fix_heimdal.sh if Heimdal IP addressing has changed outside the 10.0.0.2/10.0.0.3 range without first updating the CANDIDATES list. Do not run repeatedly in a tight loop; use it as a recovery tool, not as a heartbeat.
